about_the_game: A starter pack for Career mode that gives you 380 performance points so you can upgrade your motorbike with more advanced parts: exhaust, brakes, tyres, suspension, chassis, etc.
detailed_description: A starter pack for Career mode that gives you 380 performance points so you can upgrade your motorbike with more advanced parts: exhaust, brakes, tyres, suspension, chassis, etc.

fullgame.name: TT Isle Of Man: Ride on the Edge 3

name: TT Isle Of Man 3 - Career Starter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 4130T (2.9 GHz) / AMD FX 6300 (3.5 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 (2 GB) / AMD Radeon HD 5970 (2 GB)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A starter pack for Career mode that gives you 380 performance points so you can upgrade your motorbike with more advanced parts.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
